about_the_game:
Portabellows is an adventure of exploration and a collectathon. You must bake all the pies, and help the marooned residents off the island. Discover the mystery of what's keeping them there. New abilities will help you access more and more whimsical areas!

You are the retiree Erma, relaxing by the beach in your quiet retirement island paradise when you see a plane falling out of the sky. There starts your adventure, following clues as to where the plane pieces are!

Classic Platforming Fun

  • Explore every corner of the island: jump, sprint, swim, glide, roll your way around!

  • Platform your way around or through environment hazards

  • Acquire new abilities to explore new secrets and new areas of the island

  • Clear up every challenge room, mysteriously thrown at you to recover lost treasures : combos of platforming and puzzles

Gather ingredients to bake pies fit for a deity

  • Find them in every nook and cranny of the island

  • Uncover mysterious seeds and plant them to get ingredients

  • Rescue all the missing chicks and return them to their mother to get eggs

Pie Making

  • Assemble your ingredients to bake pies

  • Clear mini-games for pie making

Help the shopkeeper out by collecting everything

  • Watch your journal be filled in as you find ingredients and gardening techniques!

  • Win the relics back from the challenge rooms

  • Collect all the missing plane pieces

  • Be rewarded by the shopkeeper with cute assortments of outfits and gear

  • Collect jelly beans in the world to trade for useful items and upgrades

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 760
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a wholesome 3D platformer adventure where you’ll gather hard to reach ingredients for baking pies to appease a long forgotten deity, releasing the island’s quirky unwilling guests! Take your time, sip a refreshing tea and explore every nook and cranny!
